Huntington_Park.Pueblo Del Rio:
Pueblo Del Rio is a public housing project located in South Los Angeles. The address of Pueblo Del Rio is 1801 East 53rd Street, which is near the intersection of 55th and Alameda streets.
Constructed in 1941 under the auspices of the National Housing Administration, Pueblo Del Rio was originally designed to house low-income laborers at the factories south of Downtown Los Angeles and military verterans.
